Question.Subject: Why am I not getting Internet connection? FULL POINTS! HELP!?
Question.Content:
What the hell, my moms computer has wireless connection, my itouch has connection, and all of a sudden my laptop doesn't? It's a 1 year old windows vista. I click under get Internet connection, and it says it can't find my router. Well, my router works fine for my moms computer. I'm getting damn frusterated.
Any tips on what I can do? I already tried unplugging my router. It's not helping. Already did........
Question.ChosenAnswer: Not curse in your question is one thing you can do! Try rebooting the router!

Answer.Content: Not curse in your question is one thing you can do! Try rebooting the router!
